newsitem.title: USA: Edison Brothers April same store sales off.
newsitem.headline: Edison Brothers April same store sales off.

text.p: Edison Brothers Stores Inc said Thursday same store sales for the four weeks ended May 3, 1997 fell 1.8 percent from the comparable period a year ago to $66.1 million from $67.3 million.
Total sales for April declined 13 percent to $70.1 million from $80.6 million in April 1996. There were 16.7 percent fewer stores open in April 1997.
For the first quarter 1997, same store sales fell 1.9 percent to $211.2 milion from $215.2 million last year.
Total sales declined 13.2 percent to $224.0 million from $258.1 million a year ago, the retailer said.
Edison Brothers operates more than 1,700 specialty retail stores in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.
